title: This e-Bike system has NO chain or belt, and it recharges as you pedal!
content:
If you’ve heard the term “drive by wire”, get ready for e-cargo bikes that “bike by wire”. This new crankset generator from Schaeffler Group uses their automotive technologies that allow fully electronic steering, braking, and acceleration in cars to give e-bikes a completely disconnected drivetrain.
